title: All sounds in champion select are distorted for me
body:
Before I start this post I wanna say that this is definently not a lag issue. My fps is usually in 60-80 during games, the only problem I have is during champion select.

During champion select, all noises I hear from the game is distorted.
Let's say I banned ekko, I would hear:

"You (glitch noise) use (glitch noise)d to be (glitch noice) co (glitch noise)ol"

(As opposed to "you used to be cool")

If I picked lissandra, I would hear:

"I (unknown noise) will bu (glitching)ry the w-o-r-l-d in (glitch noise) ice."

(As opposed to "I will bury the world in ice")

When it's my turn to pick someone, all I hear is a loud glitching noise followed by the very ending of the "it's your turn to pick" noise.

I don't know why this is happening. It is definently not a lag issue, help?

replies.body: It seems like this might be caused by some corrupted sound files in your league directory. I'd suggest trying to repair your installation by opening the patcher, clicking on the gear icon in the upper right, and then clicking "Initiate Full Repair". Let me know how that helps!

> [{quoted}](name=Broporo,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=s49Q58p7,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-04-10T01:00:14.439+0000)
>
> It seems like this might be caused by some corrupted sound files in your league directory. I'd suggest trying to repair your installation by opening the patcher, clicking on the gear icon in the upper right, and then clicking "Initiate Full Repair". Let me know how that helps!

This has seemed to fix the problem, thank you!

Now I can bury the world with ice in confidence instead of sounding like I'm hesitating. (Lissandra joke)

This started happening (AGAIN) to me too after the new patch. Back in patch 7.1 (I think), I had the same issue, then it stopped. Now in this patch it's doing it again.

It'll be fine for a while but after playing a few games, the sound will deteriorate and become distorted, until no sounds in the Client work whatsoever.

Everything else works fine without lag or delay in the client.
